itunes:title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! - 04
title: Savage Saturday's With Derek Weida! - 04
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Derek Weida discusses why his show is perfectly imperfect, why CT Fletcher is an inspiration and why it's important to grunt when lifting, how hard it is to find the right socket for his stump, why there is no difference between him and you as far as get...
itunes:summary:
Derek Weida discusses why his show is perfectly imperfect, why CT Fletcher is an inspiration and why it's important to grunt when lifting, how hard it is to find the right socket for his stump, why there is no difference between him and you as far as getting in shape is concerned, and why he hates how everyone uses the term "journey" on social media.

description:
Derek Weida discusses why his show is perfectly imperfect, why CT Fletcher is an inspiration and why it's important to grunt when lifting, how hard it is to find the right socket for his stump, why there is no difference between him and you as far as getting in shape is concerned, and why he hates how everyone uses the term "journey" on social media.
